Uses of Class
meico.mpm.Mpm

  • Packages that use Mpm 
    Package Description
    meico.mei
    Contains the MEI class and a Helper class that is mostly used for MEI processing but offers some useful functionality also for other datatypes such as MSM and MPM.
    meico.mpm
    This package holds the official Music Performance Markup API.
    meico.musicxml
    Contains classes to interface MusicXML data.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyValue<java.util.List<Msm>,java.util.List<Mpm>> Mei2MsmMpmConverter.convert(Mei mei)
      converts the provided MEI data into MSM and MPM format and return a tuplet of lists, one with the MSMs (one per movement/mdiv), the other with the corresponding MPMs

      Methods in meico.mei with parameters of type Mpm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Mei2MsmMpmConverter.mpmPostprocessing(Mpm mpm)
      some mpm data is not in its final state (e.g., dynamics elements with an end attribute), this method makes these final
      Method parameters in meico.mei with type arguments of type Mpm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Mei2MsmMpmConverter.mpmPostprocessing(java.util.List<Mpm> mpms)
      some mpm data is not in its final state (e.g., dynamics elements with an end attribute), this method makes these final
